title: How to Generate Images - Intro to Deep Learning #14
excerpt: We're going to build a variational autoencoder capable of generating novel images after being trained on a collection of images. We'll be using handwritten digit images as training data. Then we'll both generate new digits and plot out the learned embeddings. And I introduce Bayesian theory for the first
